Our services

About Us

Novare House Renovation has completed countless renovations and home improvements in London. Our focus and determination are both solely centred around you, the client. Your satisfaction is what makes us tick, and is the driving force that helps us to create and renovate the most stunning spaces.

If you are looking for home improvements in Fulham, Battersea, Clapham, Wandsworth, Chelsea, Central and South West London areas, then House Renovation London is your premier choice. We are also able to take on smaller scale projects such as painting & decorating, tiling or plastering.

Our Services

With your vision and our expertise, you can be sure that your home renovation will capture your heart.
